name: Grapple Reef
description:
As an submarine rubbish collector, you're equipped with three grapple hooks which allow you to manoeuvre around the ocean and grab rubbish so you can dispose of it cleanly.

  • The entire game is played by moving your mouse and clicking LMB.
  • You have three lives and missing a piece of rubbish takes away one of your lives.
  • The lightest grapple hook is the one about to be repositioned.
